puzzle.body: The majority of tests here are disabled, because YMOCK doesn't work at the moment with this Socket mocking mechanism. As soon as this feature is fixed in YMOCK let's use it here
This test is disabled because of a defect in Jersey: http://java.net/jira/browse/JERSEY-1128. Once it is resolved we can try to enable the test and see how it works.
Add a correct test for http schema - need to create a template file that will be always available on the web.
